title: RP for free?
body: Heres the thing, my friend just bought a pre paid card and got RP, but I think there is at least one way to earn RP for free, u know by watchin ads and stuff, coz my parents wont let me buy a card even though i get super great marks at school, they said that games are not the stuff we should be spending money on. So plz can anyone help me, any help will be gladly appreciated.

replies.body:
The only "free RP" that is legitimate are either giveaways from streamers or winning tournaments.

You also get 400 free RP when you reach level 4 or something LOL

Riot can't add getting RP for doing something because people will just create bots that farm RP and make lots of money. Half the reason the refer-a-friend system was changed,

> I think there is at least one way to earn RP for free, u know by watchin ads and stuff

They're probably all scams of some kind, it's best to avoid them. Really the only legitimate way to earn "free" RP is through tournaments or certain promotions Riot does on occasion.
thanks guys, i think i'll just wait until I become pro and join tournaments, but b4 dat happens maybe i'll just enjoy what currency i have and kill people using {{champion:84}}  LOL, thanks again :)
